item.gems.tracker_compass.desc: Right-click to pick a player; tracks last seen + respawn coords and points toward them.
item.gems.recall_relic.desc: Right-click to mark a spot; reuse to return (consumes the mark).
item.gems.hypno_staff.desc: Hold the beam for 3s to temporarily control mobs (except blacklisted).
item.gems.earthsplitter_pick.desc: Right-click to toggle 3x3x3 or 9x3x1 mining (Silk Touch applies to all blocks).
item.gems.supreme_helmet.desc: Supreme set: Night Vision + Water Breathing.
item.gems.blood_oath_blade.desc: Gains +1 Sharpness per unique player kill (cap X).
item.gems.demolition_blade.desc: Right-click to arm a demolition charge on your target.
item.gems.hunters_sight_bow.desc: Aim assist toward your last hit target within range.
item.gems.third_strike_blade.desc: Every 3rd crit in a 5s chain deals bonus damage.
screen.gems.gem_trader.title: Gem Trader
screen.gems.purchase.title: Gem Purchase
screen.gems.gem_trader.hint: Pick a gem to activate. Trading consumes a Gem Trader.
screen.gems.purchase.hint: Pick any gem to add. Purchasing consumes a Gem Purchase Token.
item.gems.gem_seer.desc: Right-click to view any online player's gem info.
item.gems.experience_blade.desc: Consume XP to gain Sharpness (10->II, 20->IV, 30->VI, max XX at 100 levels).
item.gems.duelists_rapier.desc: Right-click for parry window; successful parry grants guaranteed crit.
item.gems.reversal_mirror.desc: Right-click to reflect all incoming damage back for 5 seconds.
item.gems.hunters_trophy_necklace.desc: On player kill, permanently gain victim's highest passive.
item.gems.gladiators_mark.desc: Brand a player; both deal 50% more damage to each other for 60s.
item.gems.soul_shackle.desc: Link to an enemy; damage you take is split between you for 10s.
item.gems.challengers_gauntlet.desc: Challenge a player to a duel arena; winner gains energy.
screen.gems.gem_seer.title: Gem Seer
screen.gems.gem_seer.hint: Select a player to view their gem info.
